name: Project Castaway
description:
Important Disclaimer:



Please note this is an early access game with the following that works right now:
The Current state of Early Access is buggy. We have online co op working, and the following,
Crafting, Base building, Hunting Animals, cooking, days progression, and navigating rafts.

There is no real end game. Not as many animations as we'd like as well.

If your still interested and would like to join us on a journey for 2-3 years into building the most fun survival experience that we can then read on.


SURVIVE. CRAFT. BUILD.

Project Castaway is a game that challenges you to survive in the pacific ocean. Take on the elements, wildlife, and your own mortality as you try your best to survive against a hostile environment.

Key features

  • Character Hunger, Thirst, Body Temperature Mechanics
  • Crafting Items
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Food Cooking Mechanics
  • Base building
  • Create your own rafts and set sails on the seas in search of more resources.
  • Hunt Animals
  • Online Co- Op Support
  • Weather Cycle

This is only the beginning!
